LanguageData.Anon2Dresser.label: dresser
LanguageData.Anon2Dresser.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort slightly.
LanguageData.Anon2EndTable.label: end table
LanguageData.Anon2EndTable.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort slightly.
LanguageData.Anon2RoyalEndTable.label: royal end table
LanguageData.Anon2RoyalEndTable.description: This small table goes well with a royal bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort.
